name: knr-bridge-app
description: Tauri bridge app for uploading Opentrons protocols
author: Koen Marijt

scripts.clean: npm run clean:cargo && npm run clean:temp && npm run clean:node
scripts.start-fresh: npm run clean && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.size: du -sh . && echo '---' && du -sh node_modules src-tauri/target 2>/dev/null || echo 'Build artifacts not found'
scripts.check: npm run check:cargo && npm run check:deps
scripts.lint: cd src-tauri && cargo fmt && cargo clippy
scripts.info: echo 'ðŸš€ KNR Bridge Tool' && echo 'Dev: npm run dev' && echo 'Clean: npm run clean' && echo 'Fresh start: npm run start-fresh' && echo 'Mock server: npm run mock'
